mapper.sql: SELECT rtno, titl, conts, url, type, rtdt, meno, meno2 FROM p_rept
mapper.select:
SELECT rtno, titl, conts, url, type, type_detail, rtdt, rept.meno, rept.meno2, mete.email, mete.nick, mete2.email, mete2.nick as mete2nick FROM p_rept as rept join p_mete as mete join p_mete as mete2
on rept.meno = mete.meno and rept.meno2 = mete2.meno

SELECT rtno, titl, conts, url, type, type_detail, rtdt, rept.meno, rept.meno2, mete.email, mete2.email mete2email, mete.nick as metenick, mete2.nick as mete2nick FROM p_rept as rept join p_mete as mete join p_mete as mete2
on rept.meno = mete.meno and rept.meno2 = mete2.meno and rept.stat = 'I' limit #{rowNo},#{size}

SELECT rtno, titl, conts, url, type, type_detail, rtdt, r.meno, r.meno2, mete.nick as metenick, mete2.email as mete2email, mete2.nick as mete2nick FROM p_rept r join p_mete mete join p_mete mete2 WHERE r.meno = mete.meno AND r.meno2 = mete2.meno AND (r.stat='Y' OR r.stat='N') GROUP BY r.meno2
limit #{rowNo} , #{size}
select count(meno2) from p_rept where meno2=#{value} and stat ='Y'

SELECT mete.nick as metenick, mete2.nick as mete2nick, rept.rtno, rept.type, rept.type_detail, rept.titl, rept.conts, rept.url, rept.rtdt FROM p_rept rept join p_mete mete2 join p_mete mete WHERE rept.meno2 = mete2.meno and rept.meno = mete.meno and meno2=#{meno2} and rept.stat ='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_rept(titl, conts, url, type, rtdt, meno, meno2,type_detail,stat) VALUES(#{titl},#{conts},#{url},#{type},now(),#{meno},#{meno2},#{type_detail},'I')
